===Etymology===
Phrase consisting of {{compound|ja|草|tr1=kusa|t1=[[grass]]|薙|tr2=nagi|t2=[[cutting]]; [[mowing]]|pos2=the [[連用形#Japanese|continuative or stem form]] of the verb {{m|ja|薙ぐ|tr=nagu||to [[cut]]; to [[mow]]}}|の|tr3=no|pos3=possessive particle|剣|tr4=tsurugi|t4=[[double]]-[[edge]]d [[sword]]}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

The name derives from a legend wherein the sword was used to cut grass, thereby saving the wielder from a deliberately-set fire. See the [[w:Kusanagi|Wikipedia article]] for details.
